subject: From: Mrs, Eunice Katuche
body:
From: Mrs, Eunice Katuche                                                                 4th March, 2024
The Director, Debt Reconciliation Committee
Your attention
This Committee on Debt Reconciliation Committee has been instructed to communicate to you in regards to the debt owed to you by the Federal Government of Nigeria. Record proof that your funds $9.8m were placed on hold by the previous administration.
However, This present administration has come up with modalities for the sake of pacification to settle all legitimate debt owed to foreign companies and individuals, which you are among. and Scotia bank has been nominated to pay all the beneficiaries their legitimate entitlements.
Therefore, contact Mrs Eunice Katuche the Director, Debt Reconciliation Committee on this email address  
accessintltrans@gmail.com
  on how to contact Scotia bank for proceeding toward payment of your funds entitlement.
Yours Sincerely
Mrs. Eunice Katuche
Director, Debt Reconciliation Committee.

subject: Re:   From: Mrs, Eunice Katuche
body:
Hello Mrs. Eunice Katuche,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I must say, this is quite a surprise! I wasn't aware that the Federal Government of Nigeria owed me any debt. Could you please provide more details about this? How did my name come up in your records?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Gerald
